main event: On June 6, 1968, Mr. J. Smith and Mrs. M. Johnson saw a bright oval-shaped light emitting a glow while driving near Davenport, Iowa.
interesting points: The object hovered for several minutes,The object was estimated to be about 30-40 feet in diameter,Multiple witnesses reported similar observations,The object moved silently with no visible means of propulsion,The sighting was officially documented by Project Blue Book.
sighted object: bright oval-shaped light in the sky
witness description: Mr. J. Smith and Mrs. M. Johnson, who were driving south on Highway 61.
